message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1250000. It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, while I understand your position, $900000 is far too low for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need at least $1050000 to make this worthwhile.  Let's find a solution that works for both of us.
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit far from your latest offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $1025000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
